oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Idlewild
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Teacher: Miss Laughter -- Notes on Back: R.O. Tucker (Ollie) - born Dec. 1907 -- 2nd Row 7. Elizabeth McLeod -- Third Row: 1. Lorraine Paston 4. Mary Kalloher -- Fourth Row: 1. Prof. T. J. O'Neil
